Namibia

Native Name: Republic of Namibia

Population: 2,540,916

Region: Africa

Sub Region: Southern Africa

Capital: Windhoek

Top Level Domain: .na

Currencie: Namibian dollar

Currencie symbol: $

Lenguages: Afrikaans, German, English, Herero, Khoekhoe, Kwangali, Lozi, Ndonga, Tswana
